overview: Corazón de melón is a Mexican comedy film released on August 8, 2003 and directed by Luis Vélez.  The plot of the film is narrated in the first person, and, embracing the main issue, the introduction, development, the knot and the outcome as a recipe are presented, respectively, "entry", "soup", "dish strong" and "dessert ".
title: Corazón de melón
